lines: OH, THE BEST FRIEND TO HAVE IS JESUS
1. Yesu Hi Yena Nakulorhi, Exikarhi Ka Maxangu,
U Ta Susa Ripfalo, A Ku Tiyisa Nhlana,
Ku Hava La Fanaka Na Yena, U Ta Ndzi Sirheleta, Na Ku Ndzi Sirhelela, Yesu Hi Ye Nakulorhi.
2. Loko Ndzi Nghena Nhlomulwen, Mati Ya Yordani Yo Chavisa,
Ndzi Na Rona Ripfalo, Ndzi Pfune Wena Yesu, U Nakulorhi Wa Mina.
3. Hi Ta Fika Kaya Tilweni, Hitshama Swinâ€™we Nava Kwetsimi,
Hi Ta Dzunisa Hosi, Swingari Na Kuhela, Yesu Hiyena Nakulorhi.
